item.title: Downloads
item.description: Current forked releases # Please see https://github.com/arch1t3cht/Aegisub/releases/. Old Aegisub releases # The Latest Release version is 3.3-08, released November 2, 2022 See the changelog for a list of changes. Upcoming Versions # Check CI build Dictionaries # To cut down on the download size, the Windows “Full” Install includes only a US English dictionary for the spell checker. All others must be downloaded separately: 3.0 Language Notes File MD5 Catalan Aegisub-3.
